OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord administration schedule arsenic trioxide ( 5 day week vs 7 day week ) . Patients receive arsenic trioxide IV 1 hour daily bone marrow blast less 5 % maximum 60 day . Beginning 3-6 week induction , patient achieve complete remission receive arsenic trioxide IV 1 hour daily either 5 day 7 day week 25 day . Subsequent consolidation course give 4 week treatment-free interval course . Treatment continue maximum 5 consolidation course absence unacceptable toxicity disease progression . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year , every 6 month 3 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 13-40 patient accrue study within 3 year .
